mapper.insert: Insert into timetable(day_id, lesson_number_id, class_id, subject_id, classroom_id, teacher_id) values (#{day.id}, #{lessonNumber.id}, #{grade.id}, #{subject.id}, #{room.id}, #{teacher.id})
mapper.select: Select tt.id as timetable_id, d.name as day_name, ln.time_name as time_name, c.id as class_id, c.name as class_name, cr.id as classroom_id, cr.number as classroom_number, cr.type as classroom_type, t.id as teacher_id, t.first_name as teacher_first_name, t.last_name as teacher_last_name, s.id as subject_id, s.name as subject_name, s.room_type_needed as subject_room_type from timetable tt inner join days d on tt.day_id = d.id inner join lesson_numbers ln on tt.lesson_number_id = ln.id inner join classes c on tt.class_id = c.id inner join classrooms cr on tt.classroom_id = cr.id inner join teachers t on tt.teacher_id = t.id inner join subjects s on tt.subject_id = s.id
